keyword: how many calories in guinness stout
title: How Many Calories in Guinness Stout?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in Guinness stout per standard 12 oz serving, including carbs, protein, sodium, and quick nutrition breakdowns for this popular beer.
h1: How Many Calories in Guinness Stout?
assumptions: Standard Guinness Draught, 4.2% ABV, per 12 fl oz (355 ml) serving; no added mixers or garnishes.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by variant, brand, serving size, and temperature; alcohol content affects calorie absorption. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard 12 oz serving of Guinness stout contains about 125 calories, mostly from carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Mixed half with diet soda (reduces density)

faqs.q: How many calories in one Guinness stout?
faqs.a: About 125 calories in a standard 12 oz serving of Guinness Draught.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in Guinness stout?
faqs.a: Approximately 9.4 g of carbohydrates per 12 oz serving, with 0 g fiber or sugars.

faqs.q: Does Guinness stout have protein or fat?
faqs.a: It has about 0.9 g protein and 0 g fat per serving.

faqs.q: How does serving size affect calories in Guinness?
faqs.a: Calories scale with volume; a 20 oz pint has around 208 calories.

faqs.q: Is Guinness stout low in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, about 20 mg sodium per 12 oz serving.
